SKU591952.Name: Colusa Large Square Mirror
SKU591952.Description: Rough-cast, brass-finished aluminum frames oversize square mirror in organic style. Rounded corners add an antique feel to the simple silhouette. We love it on a mantel or making a statement in the entryway. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Not recommended for use in bathrooms

SKU588800.Name: Palamos Rattan Mirror
SKU588800.Description: Honey-colored rattan frames looking glass in unexpected, diamond-like shape. The rattan is steamed, formed into shape and finally finished—all by hand, no less. Mirror hangs from a distressed leather strap attached with brass tacks that give it all a vintage vibe. Looks especially cool hanging from our Hex Brass Wall Hook. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Not recommended for use in bathrooms

SKU587922.Name: Impression Multicolor Mirror
SKU587922.Description: Mirror glass goes '70s tonal. Silver, copper, bronze and black mirrors connect in abstract geometric pattern to create this unique piece that works more as decor than a traditional mirror. Can be hung vertically or horizontally; we love it in groups of two. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass, engineered wood and metal

SKU587960.Name: Deepa Square Diamond Mirror
SKU587960.Description: We could make a bad joke here involving the phrase "hip to be square," but we like to think we're cooler than that. Curved edges and a champagne finish take this almost retro mirror to chic new heights. Hang it as a square or as a diamond; your choice. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass, engineered wood, stainless steel

SKU599633.Name: Suva White Rough Cast Mirror
SKU599633.Description: Rough-hewn aluminum in bright white finish frames oblong mirror in organic style. Aluminum is cast entirely by hand, with a sanded texture that feels almost plaster-like (a look we're very into at the moment). Hangs vertically or horizontally to suit your mood and your space. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Aluminum, mirror glass, engineered wood and iron

SKU590713.Name: Infinity White Mirror Rectangular 24"x36"
SKU590713.Description: Mirror image without bounds: framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum with a bright white finish. Handmade frame resists corrosion so it's perfect in the bath. Cleat mount for horizontal or vertical placement. Mounting hardware included. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with aluminum frame in white finish

SKU590728.Name: Infinity Round White Mirror 24"
SKU590728.Description: Mirror image without bounds: framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum with a bright white finish. Handmade frame resists corrosion so it's perfect in the bath. Mounting hardware included. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with aluminum frame in white finish

SKU590739.Name: Infinity Round White Mirror 36"
SKU590739.Description: Mirror image without bounds: framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum with a bright white finish. Handmade frame resists corrosion so it's perfect in the bath. Mounting hardware included. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with aluminum frame in white finish

SKU590781.Name: Clooney Antiqued Round Mirror 36"
SKU590781.Description: Round mirror is hand-aged and antiqued for seriously vintage vibes while industrial black iron frame keeps it from going too flea market. Hang in the bedroom or hallway for a touch of modern drama. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with black powdercoated iron frame
Not recommended for use in bathrooms

SKU592266.Name: Demura Brass Round 24" Mirror
SKU592266.Description: Mirror takes on an au naturel shape in shiny brass finish. Round frame widens on the side/bottom, depending on how you hang it, for an organic feel. An elegant statement piece alone or as part of a gallery wall. CB2 exclusive.

SKU626188.Name: Button Round 25.5" Mirror
SKU626188.Description: Cute as a … you know how it goes. Brass mirror reflects in modern–meets–art deco style. Rough-textured "buttons" are individually hand-cast and welded together to create a unique, round frame. CB2 exclusive.

SKU594145.Name: Monaco Black 33.5" Round Mirror
SKU594145.Description: Dark teak wood makes a handsome frame for round mirror, elevated with channeled detailing along the wood. Perfect over a dresser or above a modern mantel. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Teak wood, mirror glass and plywood
Not recommended for use in bathrooms

SKU624208.Name: Emery Round Mirror with Marble Shelf
SKU624208.Description: Round mirror rises out of built-in marble ledge. Shelf extends long, creating a daring silhouette and practical storage solution. Ideal for displaying design objects in the entry or adding polished cool to the vanity. CB2 exclusive.

SKU477920.Name: Fluted Mirror
SKU477920.Description: Fluted glass frames sleek rectangular mirror in a linear textured pattern that diffuses and reflects light. Adds dimension, architectural interest and slight art deco vibes to the wall. CB2 exclusive.

SKU476108.Name: Fontaine Mirror

SKU476197.Name: Clinch Square Mirror

Different wall materials may require different types of fasteners; use fasteners suitable for the walls in your home

SKU476167.Name: Fiato Mirror

SKU590796.Name: Clooney Antiqued Floor Mirror 32"X76"
SKU590796.Description: Floor mirror is hand-aged and antiqued for seriously vintage vibes while industrial black iron frame keeps it from going too flea market. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with black powdercoated iron frame
Not recommended for use in bathrooms

SKU593808.Name: Stella Acrylic Floor Mirror
SKU593808.Description: Thick acrylic border frames full-length floor mirror, reflecting the room without taking up visual space. Thin lines of pure brass inlaid in the frame add a modern design detail and elegant twist. CB2 exclusive.

SKU590774.Name: Infinity White Floor Mirror 32"x76"
SKU590774.Description: Looking glass framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum with bright white finish. Handmade frame resists corrosion so it's perfect in the bath. Anti-tip hardware included.
Features: Mirror glass with aluminum frame in white finish

SKU477008.Name: Abel Leaning Floor Mirror
SKU477008.Description: Rough-hewn aluminum suspends long, slender floor mirror on either side. Mirror leans against the wall to add organic style and natural elegance to any room. Anti-tip hardware included. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with rough-cast aluminum in a distressed brass finish

SKU488861.Name: Palisade Brass Frameless Floor Mirror
SKU488861.Description: Know your angles: frameless floor mirror is deceptively elegant in its simplicity. Antique brass base supports a full-length looking glass with chic beveled edges. Perfect in the bedroom and for snapping your OOTD. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with antique brass-finished iron base

SKU483908.Name: Nouveau Floor Mirror
SKU483908.Description: Stunning vintage-inspired mirror manages to be both delicate and grandiose at the same time. Topped with elegant curved corners and crowned with a jeweled adornment, mirror leans against the wall and opens up any room with stunning style. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with brass-lacquered iron frame

SKU483718.Name: Fisher Link Floor Mirror
SKU483718.Description: Oversized floor mirror pays homage to a classic Jennifer Fisher design: "The link we have that sort of floats around the mirror is actually one of the links from a chain we've had since we started the company," Jennifer explains. The shiny champagne gold finish also nods to jewelry without being in your face about it. "It will work anywhere in your house." CB2 exclusive.
Features: Stainless steel with champagne gold finish

SKU477030.Name: Legato Marble Oval Floor Mirror
SKU477030.Description: Pill-shaped freestanding mirror makes a simple yet stunning statement, rising from a round black floral marble foundation with rich, warm tones of gold, copper, beige, tan and more. Timeless shape and unique base make this a true heritage piece. No two will be exactly alike. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with black powdercoated iron frame

SKU478157.Name: Drommen Black Standing Mirror
SKU478157.Description: Sleek and architectural mirror in sophisticated black wood tones is a dream from every angle. Designer Jannis Ellenberger notes "the combination of contrasting materials and inclining lines makes the design modern and fresh." Standing mirror is a natural complement to our Drommen Bed. Learn more about Jannis Ellenberger on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with engineered wood frame in acacia finish with black lacquer

SKU345657.Name: Logan Leather Floor Mirror
SKU345657.Description: If your favorite leather jacket turned into a floor mirror, this is what it would look like. Distressed grey leather makes a very rocker-chic frame, adding texture and edge to any space. We especially love it as a statement piece in the bedroom. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass and distressed buffalo leather frame

SKU658726.Name: Infinity 16"x69" Standing Floor Mirror
SKU658726.Description: simple reflections. Mirror image without bounds framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum. Resists corrosion to work bath, too.

SKU531428.Name: Infinity Black Standing Mirror 16"x69"
SKU531428.Description: Simple reflections. Mirror image without bounds framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum with a black finish. Handmade frame resists corrosion so it's perfect in the bath. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror glass with aluminum frame in black finish
Clean with soft cloth, glass cleaner

SKU507887.Name: Infinity Brass 16"x69" Standing Mirror
SKU507887.Description: simple reflections. Mirror image without bounds framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum with a brass plated finish. Resists corrosion so it's perfect in the bath.

Due to the finishing process, copper finish undertones and hue may vary slightly from piece to piece

SKU626921.Name: Drommen Standing Mirror
SKU626921.Description: so inclined. Sleek and architectural, mirror designed by Jannis Ellenberger is a dream from every angle. Aligned with Ellenberger's style of simple construction with unexpected details, "the combination of contrasting materials and inclining lines make the design modern and fresh." With its warm tones and graceful grain, solid sustainable acacia wood intersects angular legs that meet in an open back on low-profile platform—a natural complement to the drommen bed. Learn more about Jannis Ellenberger on our blog. drommen 25.25"x67" standing mirror is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mirror: Glass with a mirror lacquer

SKU142524.Name: Gloss Floor Mirror
SKU142524.Description: Quite the looker. Statement-making mirror adds depth to the room with a head-to-toe view. Arched up top and straight along the bottom, mirror's brass-finished detailing adds fine finish. Anti-tip hardware is included. Learn more about Noël Ashby on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Iron sheet at base with antique brass finish
Clean with soft cloth, glass cleaner

SKU375921.Name: Grace Bone Inlay Floor Mirror
SKU375921.Description: Mirror image. Inspired by African murals, this graphic vision comes from the creative mind of Brett Beldock. Two thin bands of brass frame a mosaic of opalescent ivory and grey bone. Leans effortlessly against any wall. Anti tip hardware is included. Learn about Brett Beldock on our blog.

SKU174263.Name: Acacia Wood Floor Mirror
SKU174263.Description: natural perspective. Solid sustainable acacia wood comes full length to showcase a sweeping grain and warm hi/lo tones. Standing at 6 feet high, handcrafted wood frame borders an inset mirror with 3D depth. Lean against the wall. Anti tip hardware is included.
Features: Due to natural characteristics of wood, tone and grain will vary; each is unique
Wipe with a soft, dry cloth

SKU178538.Name: Infinity 32"x76" Floor Mirror
SKU178538.Description: simple reflections. Mirror image without bounds framed thin, trim and exact in pure extruded aluminum. Resists corrosion to work bath or kitchen, too. Back keyhole mount for anti tip hardware. Anti tip hardware is included.
